title: EluguHcman
author: EluguHcman
content: Don't be deceived, not every gamblers who actually claims that they won really won.Some falsefully speculates that they won just because they want to pave an ease to those who has been advising them to quit or limits gambling simply because the gambler has been unlucky to win instead he keep betting over and over without a good bankroll management in their gambling carriers.They basically do this because they feels disturbed and inconveniences of the people's opinions and advices towards the gamblers unprofitable gambling experiences

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Truthfully, the disdain that comes with loosing on a bet that you have been warned about is what births this false claims of winning even when there is nothing to prove. Maybe its even necessary to keep the wins to one's self whenever it is the case. I see no need to want to prove a point when you actually responsible for the outcome of whatever investment you have with your funds.

comments.author: Hirose UK
comments.body: Gambling is everyone decision and choice, so whatever the outcome, only he himself feels it.Maybe there are some people who think they don't wear their heart well, but at least as long as don't gamble to harm other people and disturb other people, then whatever assumptions they have there is no need to think about it.Trying to prove to others by exceeding or forcing one abilities will only complicate and worsen the situation because someone who does this will definitely gamble with hatred and emotion.In gambling, emotional feelings if they cannot be controlled can basically be very dangerous.If gamblers bet with emotional feelings, they will definitely be more careless and not think much so that losing becomes the final goal.My advice is that as much as possible, we should be better as gamblers who stay on the safe path and whatever other people opinions about the results we get, we don't need to think too much about it.Moreover, every defeat is only us who feel it, those people who don't like us will definitely just laugh at the suffering we experience.Keep in control and don't go beyond limits just to provide ridiculous evidence and never assume can show winning results because that doesn't provide any benefits.

What if you are asked to provide proof of your win or asked to show the money you won, what will be your reaction? Maybe they will fake slips or borrow money to cover up the lies and deception. However, if you know that people close to you are not comfortable with your gambling life, keep it secret or quit. But I also think that every responsible gambler shouldn't suffer from external pressure especially if you are mature and earn your own money. Â You don't have to lie just to please people, that's a big sign of immaturity.

comments.body: Quote from: EluguHcman on December 15, 2023, 01:57:26 AMDon't be deceived, not every gamblers who actually claims that they won really won.They basically do this because they feels disturbed and inconveniences of the people's opinions and advices towards the gamblers unprofitable gambling experiencesThey do this because of shame of playing consistently without winning. It is shameful sometimes when you have not won a bet.Sometimes too gamblers do that saying they won their bet while they didn't because they have boosted on the prediction that they have made to be a sure winning. Sometimes when you are watching live match with fellow bettors on a viewing center, a bettor can keep boosting about the match making others to regret the line of their bet while the game was going on and if things turn around in the match against the booster, he might still lie that he took another option and not the one he was boosting about. All these happen because people don't want to be associated with failure.

comments.author: TopTort777
comments.body: So what is the idea of this topic? Confirm once again that people lie? Personally, I dont care if gambler boasts about how much he had won. Because I know that behind that one big win are thousands of losses, that makes his total gambling balance negative or little above zero  Somehow, if someone comes to me first to share that he had won a million, I would not trust him. Few people like to show that they won a lot.

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: I can't boldly say that such thing happens even though they are doing that imppressed people overhere is like still deceiving oneself but at what point would they stop doing that because I see no reason to come posse a winning they aren't. Well it could be true but sincerely there are genuine winners who come to announce or post about their winning and Yes you will affirmed that such user is actually not far from the truth of what he is saying.

As I have said, everything that happens while we gamble is our own responsibility without having to lie by admitting we won even though we actually lost.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: I don't really believe anyone's story, let alone seeing someone's winnings at gambling through their stories and social media, after all it's not important for them to share their winnings because in my opinion it's just a story that I don't need to hear and see, for me gambling is not just about getting money. just winning, let alone manipulating winnings from the gambling we play and that won't be a motivation for me either.Playing gambling for me is how to enjoy the game, not just chasing wins in it, even though while playing we definitely feel winning and losing, it's just that we don't know when we have to stop gambling when we play, very often people who play gambling forget to stop playing gambling. even though if that could be done he would definitely be a professional gambler, to be a gambler the most important thing is to know when to gamble and know when to stop gambling, that's all

Other people are those influencers who promotes a gambling site using demo money that they gamble and claim they won, it's a marketing side of gambling and we should all be aware of that. What we can only do to minimize the risk in gambling is to be real or to be true with our experience, we don't need to lie just to impress people as it's normal that we lose since the winning percentage of a gambler in the long run is probably just 1%, so don't convince people that we are exceptional when we are not.

In fact, they are the ones who brag that they won that game and the amount they won was big, and as the person who gives advice to that gambler really knows that he loses cause he/she did not show any evidence but have many excuses.Â  There's really nothing we can do about their mindset, but hopefully, as gamblers we should know our limit and what amount we can bet. When you lose gambling, it will be mixed with frustration, depression and worse, you might do bad things just to feed your gambling habit.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: At online crypto casinos it's really unusual to see legit stories from gamblers who were cheated by the house on games' results, because there is the provably fair system to ensure the legitimacy of every bets.However, it's true there are scam casinos around and I have already seen some shocking stories of gamblers who had their prizes denied by the house due to bugs and glitches presented by the machines on the moment gamblers won.Actually, scammy casinos will use any reasons they wish as excuse to deny a payment to a winner gambler. I just think each case has to be analyzed in particular, without judging gamblers or casinos in advance, that is, without further evidences. Both sides are suceptible being the victim or guilty in the story, so be careful with your claims. There are exceptions.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: QuoteGamblers trickily claims they wins the bet while they never did.I agree with what @Hirose UK said, the situation is up to each of us.No matter how great people say about winning and losing in gambling and whatever types are claimed by gamblers, negative and positive activities are good and bad, Even if they are addicted or are regular gamblers, they still have principles regarding the gambling activities they carry out.Honestly, for me, it doesn't matter if people say they won a lot of money or are lying, it's none of my business, the point is, I stick to my principles, to carry out gambling activities, Talk is not the main thing that influences me in gambling, I have the principle that he is him and I am me.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Some gamblers want to inflate their ego with their claim to winnings and their wage, we have a lot of threads created by these gamblers many of them are newbies, and they show screenshots of their winnings, but the truth is what they won is not even half of the total money that they've lose, they are so proud of their losses but forget how huge their losses.This is to prove in their ways that there is money to be made in gambling, honestly, I don't believe in this, they only show half-proof, and they hide their losses because their losses will prove that you can lose a lot of money from gambling.Some gamblers cannot accept the fact that they will lose money on gambling, they still believe that there are methods to win money through gambling, and they will continue to do this until they run out of money.
